name: Veritas - 412 - Toro
additionalNotes:
The Veritas 412 cigar is known for its deep bold flavors and rich creamy finish. Shortly after its release, the 412 received a 90 Rating from Cigar & Spirits magazine. The 412 was named after the area code for Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, which is considered the birthplace of the Industrial Age in the
